channel.title: Public Domain on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Public Domain on Simba Tango

item.title: Why is it not in the public domain?
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: byÂ Ioan Sameli Entering a new year, it can be wise to give thought to how things could have been. Most of the world follows the USA when it comes to copyright laws, and they keep extending the copyright terms again and again. Which makes very little sense from a society stand point. Extending the copyright on the 1930s recordings of Juan D’Arienzo isn’t exactly making him pour out new hit records every month…
